title: Exercise bike
description: able to aid with weight loss. You can burn more than 600 calories an hour using a stationary bike workout, depending on your body weight and the intensity of your workout. This makes indoor cycling a great exercise choice for swiftly burning calories. Losing weight requires burning more calories than you take in.
